price: E de Allah é a soberania dos céus e da terra. Ele perdoa a quem quer e castiga a quem quer. E Allah é Perdoador, Misericordiador.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yaghfiru liman yashāu wayuʿadhibu man yashāu wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
